title: Reckless Cruel Heirs
description: The last spinoff in the USA TODAY Bestselling saga is coming!   Remo and Amara's story.  Full blurb coming soon but here are some clues as to what to expect:  1. FAE PRINCESS 2. SUPERNATURAL PRISON 3. NAKED & AFRAID vibe 4. ENEMIES TO LOVERS 5. FUTURISTIC WORLD
author: Olivia Wildenstein
